adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when value was changed by Browser.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when value was changed by Browser.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when value was changed by Flash.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when value was changed by Flash.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Registers an event listener object with an EventDispatcher object so that the listener receives notification of an event.

apiException.apiDesc: The listener specified is not a function.

apiParam.apiDesc: The listener function that processes the event. This function must accept an Event object as its only parameter and must return nothing.
Determines whether the listener works in the capture phase or the target and bubbling phases.
The priority level of the event listener.
Determines whether the reference to the listener is strong or weak.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Registers an event listener object with an EventDispatcher object so that the listener receives notification of an event. You can register event listeners on all nodes in the display list for a specific type of event, phase, and priority.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Loads the previous URL in the history list.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Loads the previous URL in the history list.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Dispatches an event to all the registered listeners.

apiException.apiDesc: The event dispatch recursion limit has been reached.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A value of true if a listener of the specified type is registered; false otherwise.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Dispatches an event to all the registered listeners.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Loads the next URL in the history list.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Checks whether the EventDispatcher object has any listeners registered for a specific type of event.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A value of true if a listener of the specified type is registered; false otherwise.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Checks whether the EventDispatcher object has any listeners registered for a specific type of event. This allows you to determine where an EventDispatcher object has altered handling of an event type in the event flow hierarchy.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Opens a new URL in the browser.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Opens a new URL in the browser.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Opens a browser popup window.

apiParam.apiDesc: Options which get evaluted and passed to the window.open() method.
Optional JavsScript handler code for popup handling.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Opens a browser popup window.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes a listener from the EventDispatcher object.

apiParam.apiDesc: Specifies whether the listener was registered for the capture phase or the target and bubbling phases. If the listener was registered for both the capture phase and the target and bubbling phases, two calls to removeEventListener() are required to remove both, one call with useCapture() set to true, and another call with useCapture() set to false.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes a listener from the EventDispatcher object. If there is no matching listener registered with the EventDispatcher object, a call to this method has no effect.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Resets the status of the browser window.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Resets the status of the browser window.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Enables or disables the creation of history entries.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Enables or disables the creation of history entries.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets the status of the browser window.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets the status of the browser window.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Enables or disables the strict mode.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Enables or disables the strict mode.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets the title of the HTML document.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets a function for page view tracking.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets a function for page view tracking. The default value is 'urchinTracker'.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates a copy of the SWFAddressEvent object and sets the value of each parameter to match the original.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a string that contains all the properties of the SWFAddressEvent object.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A string representation of the SWFAddressEvent object.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Returns a string that contains all the properties of the SWFAddressEvent object. The string has the following format:
[SWFAddressEvent type=value bubbles=value cancelable=value eventPhase= value=value path=value paths=value parameters=value]

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Map dependencies of AssetLoader.
The following depedencies are available after executing this Command:
IAssetLoader

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get an Asset by it's url.

apiReturn.apiDesc: An instance of Asset, null if not found.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get an Asset by it's url.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get an Asset by it's id.

apiReturn.apiDesc: An instance of Asset, null if not found.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get an Asset by it's id.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get a Group by it's id.

apiReturn.apiDesc: An instance of Group, null if not found.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get a Group by it's id.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Check if an Asset exists under an url.

apiReturn.apiDesc: True or False.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Check if an Asset exists under an url.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Check if an Asset exists under an id.

apiReturn.apiDesc: True or False.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Check if an Asset exists under an id.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Check if a Group exists under an id.

apiReturn.apiDesc: True or False.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Check if a Group exists under an id.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Load a group of Assets.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A new instance of Group.

apiParam.apiDesc: The urls of the Assets as an Array or Vector of Strings.
Optional closure method for retrieving AssetLoaderEvents.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Load a group of Assets.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Load a single Asset.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A new instance of Asset.

apiParam.apiDesc: The url of the Asset as a String.
Optional closure method for retrieving AssetLoaderEvents.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Load a single Asset.
The AssetLoader automatically assigns the right asset class by checking the extension of the asset. The following type's are currently supported:
BitmapAsset (png, gif, jpg and jpeg)
DisplayObjectAsset (swf)
SoundAsset (mp3, wav, aif)
CSSAsset (css)
XMLAsset (xml)

apiOperation.shortdesc: Remove an Asset by it's url.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Remove an Asset by it's url.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Remove an Asset by it's id.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Remove an Asset by it's id.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Remove a Group by it's id.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Remove a Group by it's id.

apiValue.shortdesc: Set an optional base url as a prefix for all Assets.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Set an optional base url as a prefix for all Assets.
If the requiest url of an Asset contains 'http://' the base url will not be added to the url.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This utility allows you to easily load external assets into your application.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
This utility allows you to easily load external assets into your application.
All the assets which are loaded by the AssetLoader are stored and can be retrieved at any time. This can be done by retrieving the asset by it's url or unique id.
The AssetLoader also allows you to load a group of assets at once. Therefore you will get a Group returned instead of an single Asset. That Group will have as well as the Asset an unique id you can use to retrieve it at another point within your application.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Instantiate a new Asset.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The new instance of the Asset.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Instantiate a new Asset.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Instantiate a new Group of Assets.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The new instance of the Group.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Instantiate a new Group of Assets.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Loading states for Assets and Groups.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: State after the Asset is instantiated and is not yet started to load.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: State after the Asset is successfully loaded.

The optional Group that triggered this Event.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when an Asset is successfully loaded.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when a Group failed to load (due a illegal operation or a security error).

apiValue.shortdesc: Dispatched while a Group is loading.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatched while a Group is loading.
While a Group is loading, it's Assets will be dispatched during this progress, so you are able to handle completed Assets before the whole Group is loaded (performance better wise).

apiValue.shortdesc: The Asset that triggered this Event.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The Asset that triggered this Event.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Map dependencies of Layers.
The following depedencies are available after executing this Command:
ILayers

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Transfer a Layer to an other childIndex in the contextView.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Add a Layer to the contextView.

apiValue.shortdesc: The LayersEvent that executed this Command.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The LayersEvent that executed this Command.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This utility allows you to manage your displayList in layers.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
This utility allows you to manage your displayList in layers.
The advantage of using Layers is that you have all your type of viewComponents at one place. For example all Pages are added in a Layer named pages. By using Layers you can easily switch the user interface on and off while navigating. Therefore we advice you to use Navigator or page transitions. Remember to set the property lockLayersWhileTransitioning of Navigator to true. You can also manually set the user interface on and off of the independend Layers.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Add a new Layer.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A new instance of Layer.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Add a new Layer.

apiReturn.apiDesc: An instance of Layer, null if not found.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get a Layer by it's id.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Map dependencies of Styles.
The following depedencies are available after executing this Command:
IStyles

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Utility to map dependencies of certain utilities.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Utility to map dependencies of certain utilities.
Probably the best place to define your mappings is in the mapInjections method of your Context. You can simply call the method mapDepedencies of Utilities to determine all your mappings for the following utilities.
AssetLoader
Layers
Localizer
Navigator
Router
Styles

apiOperation.shortdesc: Map dependencies of certain utilities.

apiParam.apiDesc: The utilities to map the dependencies of, must be one or multiple constants of this Class.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Map dependencies of certain utilities.

apiValue.shortdesc: Map dependencies of all utilities.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Map dependencies of all utilities.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get all Events form a provided value.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Vector instance of all Events found in the provided value.

apiParam.apiDesc: The value to get the Events from.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Get all Events form a provided value.
This method is usually called by a MacroCommand for passing through it's Events to SubCommands.
